review: Easy to use but needs an electrical outlet which is a premium since I have a tv, blue ray player, and satellite box already using outlets.  On one TV it worked fine for the first two days then wouldn't connect to the Internet. I guess it just wasn't strong enough to get the signal like my chrome book can. I moved it to another TV and it worked fine.

review: Love it! Canceled one of my direct tv subscriptions now I'm going to do the same with another tv and cancel that subscription. That being said, you have to not mind being slightly behind shows (but you could always watch the current Amazon shows ;-)  ) and have a great wireless set up.
author: Noelle

review: FireStick is awful. It buffers frequently on Netflix. But HBOGo is even worse. 1 minute of watching for 2 minutes of buffering. Totally Useless. I've done all the usual unplugging and clearing buffer etc. It just does not work.I have a 6 year old Roku box that works much better although it doesn't do higher resolution. I guess I just need to buy a newer Roku.Do yourself a favor and skip the Firestick. Unless you like frequent pauses in your viewing.
